replies.body: I just don't know why they went with white for the 100 Thieves icon. It's hard to see with the icon background and the main colors of the 100T brand are Red and Black, plus it just doesn't look good overall. I'm not buying it.
At the start of Patch 8.2, the 100T logo will be fixed to the white/red colors with the standard gray icon background!
Nice! Thank you, will definitely buy!
Any chance of getting team icon logo emotes like we did with last years summoner icons?
Will there be a bundle for each region? I would really like to buy all the NALCS icons and I really enjoyed when they came in bundles.
I did not see any LPL team icons on store.
Glad I'm not the only one miffed. I want my WE icon please and thanks!{{sticker:sg-janna}}
like only LPL teams are not included, even LCK have theirs on store. i don't know what Riot is thinking.{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
where is LPL icons, seems like they don't care LPL fans.
why didnt we get the team names in our summoner name like we did with the worlds icon.  Please riot
Where are my LPL team icons?
A google search told me that the red and t for the 100 Thieves logo should be red. Honestly it looks ugly all white.
